explanation: [0-0] A yellow, square cartoon character stands on a small wooden stool between two buckets full of snacks. The bucket on the left is filled with brown balls, and the one on the right is filled with flat, gold, coin-shaped food. The cartoon character looks happy and has one hand on the left bucket. There is a blue door in the background.
